pkgmetadata.longdescription:
admindojo.org

# Introductionadmindojo is a free, interactive Linux tutorial for (junior) sysadmins.Using local virtual machines, admindojo provides real-world scenarios in real environments.This repository contains the client that is used inside each training VM.Visit [admindojo.org](https://admindojo.org/getting-started) for more information.# Basic Usage``admindojo start`` : Start training``admindojo check`` : Run check and calculate score``admindojo --help``: help# LicenseFree software: MIT license# Credits- Package templating tool [https://github.com/audreyr/cookiecutter](ookiecutter)- Package template [https://github.com/audreyr/cookiecutter-pypackage](audreyr/cookiecutter-pypackage)
